message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1400000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product valued at $1500000 for a competitive price. We look forward to hearing your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to counteroffer at $1350000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After reviewing your proposal, we would like to counteroffer at $1450000 for the product. We believe this price reflects its value while remaining competitive in the market. We look forward to your response.
I understand Alice's position, but I would like to counteroffer at $1400000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our current market position, we are willing to negotiate further. We propose a counteroffer of $1425000 for the product. We believe this price strikes a balance between reflecting the product's value and maintaining competitiveness. We hope this aligns with your expectations and look forward to your response.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $1400000 for the product.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We appreciate your patience and understanding. After careful consideration, we are willing to accept a counteroffer of $1412500 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair margin. We hope this proposal meets your expectations and looks forward to your positive response.
